title: When you're the jungler and see the enemy's low with no way to escape

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=iJEZY62F,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-15T15:09:43.220+0000)
>
> Where is this from?

I believe it's Kung Fu Hustle?

The one moment in the movie where the Axe Gang is the hottest shit EVER! Everything they do after this literally destroys them.

For those unaware this movie is called Kung Fu Hustle. It's about Trick2g fighting Nightblue.
And then the enemy Soraka comes and heals his ally to full HP.
here's the secret, they are always low enough if they can't escape.
Soraka will then be low hp. Kill the Soraka. Run.
Nah just 1 W and R is more than enough.
.... But you're on the other side of the map and not a global ult champ.. Always seems to be my case lol
with WW I just run past them all fast like then do the thriller.
I've been putting it off, but I think it's time to watch this movie
Oh god how I loved this movie. LOL!
